sentences.en: Abundant fishery resources in Fiji attract many Chinese enterprises to invest here.
sentences.cn: 斐济丰富的渔业资源吸引越来越多的中国企业前来投资.

sentences.en: Antarctic krillorganism of the marine ecosystem and a potential fishery resource.
sentences.cn: 对于人口膨胀、食物短缺的当今世界,南极磷虾资源有着无限前景.

sentences.en: Application: Conceret cooling , Chemical processing Fishery Port, and Artificial skiing ground.
sentences.cn: 应用: 混凝土,大型化工, 渔港, 人工滑雪场.

sentences.en: Data are obtained from Ningbo Municipal Bureau of Ocean and Fishery.
sentences.cn: 本表数据来自宁波市海洋渔业局.

sentences.en: Most of the people on the island are fishery folk.
sentences.cn: 那个岛上的居民大部分是渔民.

sentences.en: Shaoguan City, fishery economy to become a new growth point.
sentences.cn: 成为韶关市渔业经济新的增长点.

sentences.en: Steady progress was made in animal husbandry and fishery industry.
sentences.cn: 畜牧业和渔业生产稳定发展.

sentences.en: Steady progress was seen in animal husbandry and fishery.
sentences.cn: 畜牧业、渔业生产稳步发展.

sentences.en: Strategic location, rich fishery resources , land , sea and air transport facilities.
sentences.cn: 地理位置优越, 渔业资源丰富, 陆海空交通便利.

sentences.en: Structural adjustment will accompany marine fishery process from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 结构调整将伴随海洋渔业过程始终.

sentences.en: Studies on Fishery Resource, Environment and Their Ecological Management of Daoguanhe Reservoir.
sentences.cn: 道观河水库渔业资源 、 环境和生态学管理的研究.

sentences.en: The golden age of whale fishery is over.
sentences.cn: 捕鲸业的黄金时代已过去.

sentences.en: The owner of the fishery shook his fist at the fire.
sentences.cn: 渔场主对着大火挥舞着拳头.

sentences.en: There are unique natural environment, rich in fishery resources.
sentences.cn: 这里有得天独厚的自然环境, 丰富的渔业资源.

sentences.en: They have also developed livestock - breeding, fishery and side occupations.
sentences.cn: 他们还发展了牧副渔业.
